publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4306 Rhoda Grant: Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk—That the Parliament welcomes the Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk, which is taking place in Inverness on Saturday 6 June 2009 to raise awareness of and money for breast cancer in the Highlands; notes that the inaugural walk last year raised £14,000, of which £7,000 was donated to the Highland Breast Care Association for the benefit of people with breast cancer and £7,000 to Macmillan Cancer Support, which, along with Citizens Advice, provides support to people with cancer who are experiencing financial difficulties as a result of their illness, and congratulates everyone participating in the moonlight walk to help raise awareness of and money for tackling breast cancer. Supported by: Peter Peacock*, David Stewart*

S3M-4306 Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk (lodged on 3 June 2009) Kenneth Gibson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Robin Harper*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Cathy Peattie*, Stuart McMillan*, Lewis Macdonald*, Mary Scanlon*, Bill Butler*, Patricia Ferguson*, Elaine Murray*, John Park*, James Kelly*, Claire Baker*

S3M-4306 Rhoda Grant: Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk—That the Parliament welcomes the Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk, which is taking place in Inverness on Saturday 6 June 2009 to raise awareness of and money for breast cancer in the Highlands; notes that the inaugural walk last year raised £14,000, of which £7,000 was donated to the Highland Breast Care Association for the benefit of people with breast cancer and £7,000 to Macmillan Cancer Support, which, along with Citizens Advice, provides support to people with cancer who are experiencing financial difficulties as a result of their illness, and congratulates everyone participating in the moonlight walk to help raise awareness of and money for tackling breast cancer. Supported by: Peter Peacock, David Stewart, Kenneth Gibson, Jamie McGrigor, Robin Harper, Dr Richard Simpson, Cathy Peattie, Stuart McMillan, Lewis Macdonald, Mary Scanlon, Bill Butler, Patricia Ferguson, Elaine Murray, John Park, James Kelly, Claire Baker, Ken Macintosh*, Elaine Smith*, Jackie Baillie*, Liam McArthur*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Jack McConnell*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-4306 Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk (lodged on 3 June 2009) Pauline McNeill*, Mary Mulligan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-4306 Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk (lodged on 3 June 2009) Trish Godman*
S3M-4306 Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk (lodged on 3 June 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-4306 Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk (lodged on 3 June 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-4306 Bra Nicht Moonlight Walk (lodged on 3 June 2009) Cathy Jamieson*
